channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Pio Terei, celebrated for his uplifting portrayal of M?ori through humour and entertainment, shares his personal story of comedy and processing grief as he takes us home to Mitimiti. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tipua
channel.desc: A series of unnerving experiences has ?repa starting to believe her friends are right - she is doing too much. Nothing is stacking up and she has no real answers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tipua
channel.desc: ?repa is still convinced someone is following her but lets her friends distract her from her worries with a party. Everything seems to go well until an uninvited guest makes an eerie appearance. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Going Native
channel.desc: Drew travels to Alberta?s grasslands to witness a unique buffalo herd restoration experiment; visits indigenously-inspired ?harmony with nature? architecture; and sees an incredible far-north First Nation vegetable and fruit greenhouse. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Uka
channel.desc: The best Euchre players from Tainui battle it out for the title of Uka champions. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K?inga Whenua
channel.desc: Pio visits Toit? Tair?whiti Housing, an Iwi collective that supports papak?inga builds, emergency housing and provides financial assistance and training to expand building capabilities of wh?nau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Amplify
channel.desc: Inuk sensation Beatrice Deer takes a deep dive into the history of Inuit residential schools to craft an arresting new song in tribute to the lost children in unmarked graves. Directed by asinnajaq. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Jordyn With A Why as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Pere Wihongi discusses the many facets of kapa haka. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?karo Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Rakau and Talking Pond Koka? live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?karo Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Rakau and Talking Pond Koka? live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? Kapa Haka Kura Tuarua 2024
channel.desc: Highlights of the most prestigious M?ori kapa haka event on the school calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? Kapa Haka Kura Tuarua 2024
channel.desc: Highlights of the most prestigious M?ori kapa haka event on the school calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Wharekura
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Te Reo)
channel.desc: What is wairua? Answered from a M?ori perspective. Explanations about the wairua of human beings and the wairua contained in all living things everywhere. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka To Worlds
channel.desc: Following the lives of the New Zealand Waka Ama Elite Junior Men and Women's teams as they train their hearts out in the quest for gold at the 2022 IVF World Sprint Championships. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Kapa Haka o Te Wh?nau-a-Apanui
channel.desc: Featuring Te Kapa Haka o Te Wh?nau-a-Apanui, Whakaata M?ori presents Te Matatini o Te K?hui Maunga - the ultimate celebration of haka excellence. This is haka at its finest.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Only In Aotearoa
channel.desc: Short, sharp comedy skits from a distinctly M?ori perspective. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rule of Mum
channel.desc: When a loveable man-child is brutally dumped, he decides it's time to take charge of his own life, but the must first overcome the biggest obstacle standing in his way: his M?m?. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kair?kau
channel.desc: An unwelcome stranger crosses a tribal boundary forcing Ng?ti Rangitihi Chief Tionga to react with caution to a possible alliance between bordering tribes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: A serial drama thats all about drama. Following a group of city based rangatahi as they navigate life. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: A serial drama thats all about drama. Following a group of city based rangatahi as they navigate life. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids. (R).
